EASTERN MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
SYRIA.
DNC 10.
1. HAZARDOUS OPERATIONS:
   A. 0500Z TO 2100Z DAILY 05, 07, 12, 21, 26
      AND 28 OCT IN AREA BOUND BY
      35-08N 035-04E, 35-08N 035-27E,
      34-49N 035-27E, 34-49N 035-04E.
   B. 0500Z TO 2100Z DAILY 14 AND 19 OCT
      IN AREA BOUND BY
      35-40N 035-00E, 35-40N 035-20E,
      34-40N 035-36E, 34-43N 034-40E.
2. CANCEL THIS MSG 282200Z OCT 21.
